timeline.message:
Don't expose DocumentMapper in ParseContext

ParseContext does not need to expose the entire DocumentMapper to its consumers. Two methods are added with this change that expose MappingLookup and the ability to retrieve metadata mappers. This way the documentMapper method can be removed.
